item.title: [Spirit Swap] SpiritSwap Fireside Chat #5 Educational series - Gauge/farm, gauge contract, using the gauge proxy.
item.description: This week's fireside we held a demonstration on how to deploy your LP tokens to their respective gauges/farms, and how to locate your respective gauge contract, using the gauge proxy contract directly.
item.dc:creator: Spirit Swap
item.itunes:author: Spirit Swap

item.title: [Spirit Swap] SpiritSwap Team AMA - First AnniversaryðŸ¥³
item.description:
SpiritSwap team celebrated its first anniversary on its discord channel with the community and our beloved host Usanko. In this special episode, Usanko from SpiritSwap DEX mostly addressed upcoming V2 upgrades, the team's daily routines, and community questions.
Make sure to check our discord for future AMA's to win rewards and have a chance at asking questions to the guest protocol.
âŒ›TimestampsâŒ› 0:00 - Intro 12:40 - What is planned for the first anniversary? 16:55 - fNFT 18:35 - Elevator Pitch/Future of SpiritSwap 26:45 - Lessons learned/What could have been done differently? 34:40 - Next steps of V2 development/WEN 39:40 - How will V2 compete with competitors? 48:20 - How will V2 improve the bribe system? 54:00 - winSpirit peg 57:00 - winSpirit Pools on V2 1:01:10 - Partnerships 1:04:20 - SpiritSwap NFT's 1:07:50 - How to filter out possible protocols/projects that have the potential to rug 1:15:27 - The End
ðŸ”—LinksðŸ”— SpiritSwap - https://www.spiritswap.finance/
ðŸ“±Social ChannelsðŸ“± Twitter - https://twitter.com/Spirit_Swap Medium - https://spiritswap.medium.com/ Discord - https://discord.gg/ecSaAn2GKs

item.title: [Spirit Swap] Stader Labs X SpiritSwap AMA
item.description:
Stader Labs is a non-custodial smart contract based staking platform that helps you conveniently discover and access staking solutions. In this episode Usanko from SpiritSwap DEX, will deep dive into Stader Labs.
Make sure to check our discord for future AMA's to win rewards and have a chance at asking questions to the guest protocol.

item.title: [Spirit Swap] Comb Financial X SpiritSwap AMA
item.description:
Comb Financial is a Defi as a Service (DaaS) platform which aims to have multiple revenue streams feeding their protocols; farms, nodes, token locking mechanism to access to protocol revenue fees... and many more to come! They are even looking to enter the metaverse! They are asking the users to beelieve in them.
In this episode Usanko from SpiritSwap DEX, takes a deep dive in to what has this protocol buzzing.
Make sure to check our discord for future AMA's to win rewards and have a chance at asking questions to the guest protocol.
ðŸ”—LinksðŸ”— SpiritSwap - https://www.spiritswap.finance/ Comb Financial - https://comb.financial/
ðŸ“±Social ChannelsðŸ“± Twitter - https://twitter.com/Spirit_Swap Medium - https://spiritswap.medium.com/ Discord - https://discord.gg/ecSaAn2GKs

item.title: [Spirit Swap] Tortleninja X SpiritSwap AMA
item.description:
Tortle Ninja is a no-code DeFi meta aggregator on Fantom which allows the creation of Tortle Combo Recipes, a combination of DeFi operations that enable you to create, shoot, repeat, and copy complex investment strategies. In this episode Usanko from SpiritSwap DEX, takes a deep dive in to Tortle Ninja!
Make sure to check our discord for future AMA's to win rewards and have a chance at asking questions to the guest protocol.

item.title: [Spirit Swap] Lend/Borrow Tutorial - Using Ola's lending network and unlock your capital
item.description:
Borrowing and lending is super easy using Ola Finance's Lending Network via the SpiritSwap 'Lend/Borrow' tab.
Ola Finance's lending network allows you to easily access capital liquidity against those holdings or simply a place to park the dormant capital and earn some extra return on the side increasing your efficiency.
This video will cover: - How lending works on SpiritSwap - How to navigate the Lend/Borrow page - How to deposit collateral - How to borrow - What else you can do with lending networks
Enjoy!

item.itunes:author: Spirit Swap
